channel.title: Project Edge-Pk 2 [Last Topic update: 30 march 2010]
channel.description:
[ul]Last updates: made duel arena work 100% Made Pestcontrol work 100%, Added skill info & some more.
*Still no pictures* Expecting them on 5 april
Inportant information: Beta Client Release (Webclient) Date Planned: 10-20 April Server Fully done [30 april or later] [list][list][center] [size=36pt]Project Edge-pk 2[/size] Server base: Winterlove Client base: I pk Noobs I's battlescape client from R-S Project leaders: Dutch God(me) & Skill Nd Pvp Modeller: Dutchy Beta Tester(S): - Laski Raukka - etro - Moppy - Raziel [OPEN] [OPEN]
[size=18pt]The Story[/size] Me and my friend decided to make a perfect server, and i know it's gonna be hard, but we're not giving up this attempt. we have seen loads of server, but all of them are not perfect, we want a high-stable server with a stable economy + Perfect skilling & Pking (player killing) Also we have seen loads of shit servers with short easy or just always the same quests, there are enough peeps who like to do quests, so we also gonna make 10-20 custom quests (titles + rewards might be the same as in official rs, but the quest its self will be different)
[size=36pt]Quests[/size] for so far we got these quests: Not started under construction Finished [list] [li]Dessert Treasure[/li][/list] Reqs: 40 thieving, 50 magic, 70 woodcutting, 40 Agility Reward: Ancient magics, ability to use ancient staff + master wand [list][li]Legends Quest[/li][/list] Reqs: 70 Agility Reward: Crystal Bow, Dragon SQ Shield Right half. [list][li]Spartacus[/li][/list] Reqs: Atleast 250 Player Kills & 70 Strength/Ranged/Magic Rewards: 500 Pk Points, 500.000 Cash, 50.000 Experience in Strength/Ranged/Hp [list][li]Master Skill 1[/li][/list] Reqs: 2 Non-combat 99 skills. Reward: 1 Xp lamp for 1.000.000 Experience (cannot choose Slayer/Firemaking) [list][li]Master Skill 2[/li][/list] Reqs: 5 Non-Combat 99 skills. Reward: 1 Xp lamp for 1.000.000 Experience (cannot choose Slayer/Firemaking), the ability to teleport to the skilling area. [list][li]Trouble in edge[/li][/list] Reqs: None Reward: The Ability to use the lever which teleports you to the rune rocks on 15 wilderness. [list][li]Mole Slayer[/li][/list] Reqs: 25 Slayer & 10 pk kills Reward: 25.000 Slayer experience + the ability to fight the giant mole whenever you like. [list][li]Insect Slayer[/li][/list] Reqs: 60 Slayer + Finished Mole Slayer Reward: 50.000 Slayer Experience + The ability to teleport directly in the Kalphite liar without having to walk the whole path. [list][li]Dagganoth Slayer[/li][/list] Reqs: 70 Slayer + Finished Insect slayer Rewards: 100.000 Slayer Experience & you can now open the dagganoth gate without needing a second person! [list][li]God Slayer[/li][/list] Reqs: 90 Slayer + Finished Dagganoth Slayer Reward: you only need 10 kc left for going one of the god bosses & 250.000 Slayer Experience [/list]
[size=36pt]Server[/size] Red is not started. Orange is under contruction green is finished [list] [li]Smoother loading after a client says "loading pleaswait" (takes only 0.3 seconds)[/li] [li]Trading[/li] [li]Potion combiner[/li] [li]Clipped npc following[/li] [li]Clipped Regular following[/li] [li]General Graardor + Minions + Animated[/li] [li]Commander Zilyana + minions + Animated[/li] [li]Kree'arra + minions + Animated[/li] [/list]
[left][size=16pt]Minigames[/size] Red is not started. Orange is under contruction green is finished
[list] [li]Duel Arena [list] [li]All rules[/li] [li]Staking[/li] [li]Duel Points[/li] [/list] [/li] [li]Pest Control [list] [li]Gaining Pc points after won.[/li] [li]Teleport back to island if won/lose[/li] [li]Portals + health[/li] [/list][/li] [li][s]Castlewars[/s] Fun pk [list] [li]Stop losing items[/li] [li]Fight all styles[/li] [li]Able to Exit "only if [u]Not[/u]" in combat[/li] [/list][/li] [li]SurViVal [list] [li]Stop losing items[/li] [li]Fight all styles[/li] [li]Custom Reward *Made by dutchy*[/li][/list] Short telling what it is: kill the most monsters + Be the last player standing. [/list] [list] [li]Fight pits[/li] [li]Fight cave[/li] [/list] [/left]
[size=36pt]Skills[/size] Red: Not started Underconstruction Finished [list] [li]Herblore[/li] [li]Slayer[/li] [li]Farming[/li] [li]Agility[/li] [li]Rune crafting[/li] [li]Crafting[/li] [li]Fletching[/li][/list]
More adding soon. [/list]
[size=36pt]Client[/size] Red is not started. Orange is under contruction green is finished [list] [li]Starts Faster[/li] [li][color=orange]Webclient[/li] [li]General Graardor + Minions + Animated[/li] [li]Commander Zilyana + minions + Animated[/li] [li]Kree'arra + minions + Animated[/li] [li]Zamorak + minions + Animated[/li] [li]Godwars Dungeon Maps[/li] [li]Warrior guild Maps[/li] [li]All godswords + Specials Fully[/li] [li]Loading all 525 Emotes[/li] [li]Loading all 525 Monsters[/li] [/list] [/center]
Some pictures:
Client: [img]http://i60.servimg.com/u/f60/13/40/50/66/edgecl10.jpg[/img]
server: Nothing to show-off-yet
Videos: None yet.
Host info: [URL=http://www.speedtest.net][img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/756532105.png[/img][/URL]
Computer speed:
[img]http://i64.servimg.com/u/f64/14/94/81/92/edge_c10.jpg[/img]
Credits: Skill nd pvp AKA PhoenixZone on mopar. For most of the coding & webclient Me for most of the coding deathschaos9 for highscores. Dutchy for models ***** for website We still need 2 beta testers & someone who is good with forums (example Vbulletin, i got scripts)
NOTE: adding skill info soon.[/ul]

item.title: Project Edge-Pk 2 [Last Topic update: 30 march 2010]
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Ik kan je client wel onderhouden, interfaces adden emotes enzo.
Client mooier maken, kleiner maken.

Translate: I can code your client, adding interfaces, emotes etc.
I can make the client looker better, more tiny.

item.title: Project Edge-Pk 2 [Last Topic update: 30 march 2010]
item.dc:creator: @mod_p mod p
item.description:
@mod_p wrote:

oohh, battlescape based webclient, i heard theres only 1 up so far :o
Good luck mate, btw: i luv your server =D just pwnd sum1 with ags =D smited him down!! muhahaha, but to bad you are re-constructing the server, no reset i heard? Awesome! and skill nd pvp, i like him, he’s a good coder had a source like gamez pvp or sumthing =p

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Edge-Pk 2 [Last Topic update: 30 march 2010]
item.dc:creator: @mpsmpsmps mpsmpsmps
item.description:
@mpsmpsmps wrote:

[ul]Last updates: made duel arena work 100% Made Pestcontrol work 100%, Added skill info & some more.

Still no pictures Expecting them on 5 april

Inportant information:
Beta Client Release (Webclient) Date Planned: 10-20 April
Server Fully done [30 april or later]
[list][list][center]
[size=36pt]Project Edge-pk 2[/size]
Server base: Winterlove
Client base: I pk Noobs I’s battlescape client from R-S
Project leaders: Dutch God(me) & Skill Nd Pvp
Modeller: Dutchy
Beta Tester(S):

  • Laski Raukka
  • etro
  • Moppy
  • Raziel
    [OPEN]
    [OPEN]

[size=18pt]The Story[/size]
Me and my friend decided to make a perfect server, and i know it’s gonna be hard, but we’re not giving up this attempt. we have seen loads of server, but all of them are not perfect, we want a high-stable server with a stable economy + Perfect skilling & Pking (player killing)
Also we have seen loads of shit servers with short easy or just always the same quests, there are enough peeps who like to do quests, so we also gonna make 10-20 custom quests (titles + rewards might be the same as in official rs, but the quest its self will be different)

[size=36pt]Quests[/size]
for so far we got these quests:
Not started
under construction
Finished
[list]
[li]Dessert Treasure[/li][/list]
Reqs: 40 thieving, 50 magic, 70 woodcutting, 40 Agility
Reward: Ancient magics, ability to use ancient staff + master wand
[list][li]Legends Quest[/li][/list]
Reqs: 70 Agility
Reward: Crystal Bow, Dragon SQ Shield Right half.
[list][li]Spartacus[/li][/list]
Reqs: Atleast 250 Player Kills & 70 Strength/Ranged/Magic
Rewards: 500 Pk Points, 500.000 Cash, 50.000 Experience in Strength/Ranged/Hp
[list][li]Master Skill 1[/li][/list]
Reqs: 2 Non-combat 99 skills.
Reward: 1 Xp lamp for 1.000.000 Experience (cannot choose Slayer/Firemaking)
[list][li]Master Skill 2[/li][/list]
Reqs: 5 Non-Combat 99 skills.
Reward: 1 Xp lamp for 1.000.000 Experience (cannot choose Slayer/Firemaking), the ability to teleport to the skilling area.
[list][li]Trouble in edge[/li][/list]
Reqs: None
Reward: The Ability to use the lever which teleports you to the rune rocks on 15 wilderness.
[list][li]Mole Slayer[/li][/list]
Reqs: 25 Slayer & 10 pk kills
Reward: 25.000 Slayer experience + the ability to fight the giant mole whenever you like.
[list][li]Insect Slayer[/li][/list]
Reqs: 60 Slayer + Finished Mole Slayer
Reward: 50.000 Slayer Experience + The ability to teleport directly in the Kalphite liar without having to walk the whole path.
[list][li]Dagganoth Slayer[/li][/list]
Reqs: 70 Slayer + Finished Insect slayer
Rewards: 100.000 Slayer Experience & you can now open the dagganoth gate without needing a second person!
[list][li]God Slayer[/li][/list]
Reqs: 90 Slayer + Finished Dagganoth Slayer
Reward: you only need 10 kc left for going one of the god bosses & 250.000 Slayer Experience
[/list]

[size=36pt]Server[/size]
Red is not started.
Orange is under contruction
green is finished
[list]
[li]Smoother loading after a client says “loading pleaswait” (takes only 0.3 seconds)[/li]
[li]Trading[/li]
[li]Potion combiner[/li]
[li]Clipped npc following[/li]
[li]Clipped Regular following[/li]
[li]General Graardor + Minions + Animated[/li]

[/list]

green is finished

Short telling what it is: kill the most monsters + Be the last player standing.
